entry.title: 2.5W White LED Emergency Light Fixtures With 2 LED Heads Battery Backup: 90 minutes
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Exit Sign /Emergency Lights
Price: 38.98

If you want your visitors to feel safe in your business, then install LED Emergency lights to provide them with a safe path during an emergency. People will visit the premises with a peaceful mind by knowing that the building is fully compliant with safety. It is used for navigating the direction of the closest exit in case of fire or any other emergency. Exit Lights are also known as emergency lights. It is a light fixture with an inbuilt battery-backed, which automatically runs if any power outage occurs. The most suitable applications for installing LED Exit Lights are Building, Aircraft, Boats, Stairs, and Hallways. Two types of LED EXIT LIGHTS are available with an attached emergency light and inbuilt battery backup, i.e., LEDMyplace offers LED emergency Lights in 2.5 watts.
